title: BLEACH Rebirth of Souls
description: Awaken the blade within you and reverse your fate in BLEACH Rebirth of Souls! Engage in thrilling battles with powerful sword abilities and characters from this legendary anime franchise. • Unleash Your Sword Choose your favorite character and unleash their unique sword abilities! Take advantage of each character’s unique abilities and command the flow of battle to find an opening that spells defeat for your enemies. • Defeat Enemies with a Single Strike In BLEACH Rebirth of Souls, a single strike can spell defeat for your opponent. Change the situation dramatically with the swing of your blade!

system_requirements.Graphics: AMD Radeon VII / Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070
